stats.history_basis module¶

stats.history_basis.history_basis(K=5, tstop=100, scale=10, normalize=0)[source]¶

Generate raised cosine history basis. TODO: this function is duplicated in several locations, consolidate.

>>> basis = history_basis(4,100,10)
>>> plot(basis.T)
Parameters:
  • K (int) – Number of basis elements. Defaults to 5
  • tstop (int) – Time-point at which to stop. Defaults to 100
  • scale (int) – Exponent basis for logarithmic time rescaline. Defaults to 10
